name: Drop iT (IgguStudio)
description:
Drop It is the free game from where you have to use your skills and achieve the goals.

The rule is simple, use physics to throw colored balls, hit the bottles and try to destroy them! You will need to act with wisdom and imagination.

You will love this game after playing some time, Addictive.

Free, play where you want. No subscription or in-app purchases. You will love this jigsaw puzzle game! Simple gameplay, with greater difficulty in each level, is addictive.

How many bottles can you destroy?   Fun and challenging this is Drop It!
